Package com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpenPageDoc.HistoryListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving history events.
    The interface receives notifications when a new history event is committed by SpenPageDoc.commitHistory(HistoryUpdateInfo)
    SpenPageDoc.LayerListener
    This listener interface is called when the state of a layer is changed.
    SpenPageDoc.ObjectIndexMovedListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving object index change events.
    Use the following method to register the listener:
    SpenPageDoc.ObjectListener
    This listener interface is called when the state of an object is changed.
    SpenPageDoc.ObjectSelectedListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving object selection events.
    Use the following method to register the listener:
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SpenNoteDoc
    NoteDoc class This class provides the functionality for managing the data of an SPD file and provides methods for loading and saving the file, adding and removing PageDocs from NoteDocs, and attaching external files.
    SpenNoteDoc.AuthorInfo
    Author Information class.
    SpenNoteFile
    SpenNoteFile class This class provides methods for managing SPD files.
    SpenObjectBase
    Base class of all primitive objects.
    ObjectBase can not be used by itself.
    SpenObjectStroke
    SpenObjectStroke class.
    SpenPageDoc
    Page document Class
    This class contains all the data in a page.
    SpenPageDoc.BackgroundEffect
    BackgroundEffect
    SpenPageDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo
    This class contains the update history information.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SpenAlreadyClosedException
    This exception occurs when use already closed instances.
    SpenInvalidPasswordException
    This exception occurs when the wrong password is entered
    SpenUnsupportedTypeException
    This exception is thrown when a document of an unsupported Pen package format is used.
    This exception occurs when the file or stream does not match the NoteDoc file format.
    SpenUnsupportedVersionException
    This exception is thrown when a document of an unsupported version is used.
